sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; export default function CartItem({ item, value }) { const { id, title, image, price, total, count } = item; const { increment, decrement, removeItem } = value; return (
Product: {title}
Price: £{price}
decrement(id)}> - {count} increment(id)}> +
removeItem(id)}>
Item total: £{total}
); }
